dataset.title: C-1 (3018 m) climate station: DP211 data.

address.deliveryPoint: Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research

abstract.para: Climatological data were collected from a Niwot Ridge climate station (C-1) throughout the year using an Omnidata DP211 datapod. This instrument has a sample interval of 5 minutes and records averages of those 5-minute readings every 2 hours. Thus, daily totals represent totals of 288 values. Parameters measured were temperature (averages) and solar radiation (totals).

description.para: The documentation section of this file was developed from the NWT LTER Data Directory (Symphony files DDABSTRA.WR1, DDDOCUME.WR1, DDMASTER.WR1, DDVARIAB.WR1; last updated 16 December 1991) and from the sdldp211.ml file by Rick Ingersoll on 10 November 1993. Data for 29 July to 4 October 1993 were appended to the data section on 10 November 1993 after being processed on culter and quality-checked by Mark Losleben. The file was then put under sccs control.[RCI 10 November 1993] Data for 5 October - 17 December 1993 were appended to the data section on 5 January 1994 after being processed on culter and quality-checked by MVL.[RCI 5 January 1994] The data section was converted to a comma delimited (as opposed to whitespace) one in order to be more consistent with other climate data files.[RCI 22 February 1994] Data for 18 December 1993 - 20 February 1994 were appended to the data section on 15 March 1994 after being processed on culter and quality-checked by MVL.[RCI 15 March 1994] Data for 21 February - 16 April 1994 were appended to the data section on 29 April 1994 after being processed on culter and quality-checked by MVL.[RCI 29 April 1994] Data for 17 April - 5 July 1994 were appended to the data section on 11 August 1994 after being quality checked by MVL.[RCI 11 August 1994] Data for 6 July - 23 September 1994 were appended to the data section on 7 October 1994 after being quality checked by Mark Losleben.[RCI 7 October 1994] Results of temperature calibrations done in September of 1994 were added to the documentation section on 29 November 1994.[RCI 29 November 1994] Comments provided by Mark Losleben with regard to the September 1994 temperature calibrations were added to the documentation section on 14 December 1994.[RCI 14 December 1994] Data for the period 29 July 1993 through 23 September 1994 were deleted from the data section on 13 January 1995 because of an error in the way the original daily data had been generated. See note in comments section for further explanation. Correctly generated daily data for the period 29 July 1993 through 11 December 1994 were appended to the data section on 13 January 1995. [RCI 13 January 1995] Data for the period 12 December 1994 - 26 February 1995 were appended to the data section on 4 April 1995.[RCI 4 April 1995] Data for the period 27 February through 11 May 1995 were appended to the data section on 23 May 1995.[RCI 23 May 1995] Data for the period 12 May 1995 - 23 July 1995 were appended to the data section on 8 August 1995.[MAH 8 August 1995] Data for the period 24 July 1995 through 10 October 1995 were appended to the data section on 31 October 1995.[MAH 31 October 1995] Data for the period 11 October 1995 through 22 December 1995 were appended to the data section on 6 March 1996.[MAH 6 March 1996] Data for the period 23 December 1995 through 10 March 1996 were appended to the data section on 14 March 1996.[MAH 14 March 1996] Data for the period 11 March 1996 through 2 June 1996 were appended to the data section 12 June 1996.[MAH 12 June 1996] Data for the period 3 June 1996 through 11 August 1996 were appended to the data section on 15 October 1996.[MAH 15 October 1996] Data for the period 12 August 1996 through 13 October 1996 were appended to the data section on 18 October 1996.[MAH 18 October 1996] Data for the period 14 October 1996 through 8 June 1997 were appended to the data section on 30 July 1997.[MAH 30 July 1997] Data for the period 9 June 1997 through 28 August 1997 were appended to the data section on 30 September 1997.[MAH 30 September 1997] Data for the period 29 August 1997 through 13 November 1997 were appended to the data section on 9 December 1997.[MAH 9 December 1997] Data for the period 14 November 1997 through 9 July 2000 were appended to the data section on 21 September 2000. URL locations for related data were updated on that date as well.[MAH 21 September 2000] Data for the period 10 July 2000 through 26 September 2000 were appended to the data section on 16 February 2001.[TMA 16 February 2001] Data for the period 27 September 2000 through 16 May 2001 were appended to the data section on 25 June 2001.[TMA 25 June 2001] Data for the period 18 May 2001 through 21 October 2001 were appended to the data section on 31 October 2001.[TMA 31 October 2001] Errors were found in the date label for 8/23/99 through 8/31/99, they were labelled with 2000 as the year, this was corrected on 14 December 2001.[TMA 14 December 2001] Data for the period 22 October 2001 thorough 19 September 2002 were appended to the data section on 7 November 2002.[TMA 7 November 2002] Data for the period 20 September through 08 December 2002 were appended to the data section on 25 March 2003.[TMA 25 March 2003] Data for the period 09 December 2002 through 8 January 2004 were appended to the data section.[TMA 15 June 2004] Data for 09 January through 18 November 2004 were appended to the data section.[23 March 2005] Data for the period 19 November 2004 through 19 July 2005 were appended to the data section.[TMA 25 August 2005] Data for the period 22 July 2005 through 10 October 2005 were appended to the data section.[TMA 27 December 2005] Data for the period 12 October 2005 through 19 March 2006 were appended to the data section.[TMA 08 June 2006]
